abstract: New York Jets anticipate the return of their all-pro center Nick Mangold, who sat out a game with an injury, as they prepare to face the New England Patriots.
snippet: The All-Pro center Nick Mangold sat out the loss to the Ravens on Sunday with a right ankle sprain, and the Jets’ rushing attack sputtered.
lead_paragraph: The All-Pro center Nick Mangold sat out the loss to the Ravens on Sunday with a right ankle sprain, and the Jets’ rushing attack sputtered.

headline.main: Jets Hope Mangold Can Lift Running Game Against Patriots
headline.print_headline: Jets Hope Mangold Can Lift Running Game Against Patriots
headline.seo: Jets Hope Mangold Can Help Them Run Against Patriots
